title: error: no suitable peers available docker ethereum light sync mode
body:

tested with this test curl command

```
$ curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getBalance","params":["0x407d73d8a49eeb85d32cf465507dd71d507100c1", "latest"],"id":1}' 10.10.10.201:8545
```

here is the docker-compose file i used

```
version: '3.9'

services:
  ethereum-node:
    image: ethereum/client-go
    restart: always
    container_name: ethereum-node
    command: ["--syncmode=light","--ws", "--ws.addr=0.0.0.0", "--ws.origins=*", "--http", "--http.addr=0.0.0.0", "--http.vhosts=*", "--graphql", "--graphql.vhosts=*", "--metrics", "--mainnet", "--maxpeers=32", "--datadir=/root/.ethereum"]
    volumes:
      - ethereum-node-data:/root/.ethereum
    ports:
      - 8545:8545
      - 8546:8546
      - 30303:30303
      
volumes:
  ethereum-node-data:
    name: ethereum-node-data
```


what do i need to do to get this node running?
